Synopsis: 
The star of the race cars, "Lightning" McQueen, and the unique crane Mate, take their friendship to exciting destinations CARS 2, when they cross the ocean to attend the first "Grand Prix", which will determine is the fastest car in the world. But the road to the championship is filled with potholes, detours and hilarious surprises when Matt is caught in a mysterious adventure of international espionage. 

Faced with the dilemma of helping to "Lightning" McQueen's career or acting in the mission of top-secret spying, the journey of Matt, full of action, leading to an explosive chase through the streets of Japan and other countries Europe, accompanied by his friends and seen by the world. Moreover, this rapid diversion adds a colorful cast of new cars, among which include secret agents, menacing villains and notable international racing competitors. 

Production notes: 
John Lasseter returns to the driver's seat to direct the continuation of Cars, the film won the Golden Globe Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® Award 2006, which was co-directed by Brad Lewis, producer of Ratatouille, the film was awarded an Oscar Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® - and produced by veteran visual effects industry Denise Ream - Up and associate producer of Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith. 

Cars 2 is the twelfth animated feature from Pixar Animation Studios (the first eleven have earned 441,000 million at the box office worldwide). Pixar, winner of 29 Academy Awards Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® and seven Golden Globes Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â®, celebrating its twentieth anniversary this year.
